PlaceholderDesc_NodeStepFunctionName: Name of the function that belongs to this node. If no node is generated this will be ""
PlaceholderDesc_NodeStepFunctionNameNoFl: Name of the function that belongs to this node. If no node is generated this will be "". Does not set the flag that the function was used.
PlaceholderDesc_NodeStepFunctionWasUsed: true if the function was already read, else false
PlaceholderDesc_NodeObject: Object to which the node belongs
